description: Web component definition for 'iron-localstorage', a Polymer element that provides access to Web Storage API (localStorage), keeping a property in sync with localStorage, with JSON serialization and event handling.

classes.name: Polymer
classes.description: Main Polymer element class used to define custom elements.

methods.name: _handleStorage
methods.description: Handles 'storage' events to reload data if the relevant key changes.

methods.name: _trySaveValue
methods.description: Attempts to save the current value to localStorage if conditions permit.

methods.name: reload
methods.description: Reloads the value from localStorage, used to sync with external changes.

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Internal method to load data from localStorage, parsing JSON unless useRaw is true.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves the current value to localStorage, serializing as JSON unless useRaw is true.
